00037 /* Creation flags */
00038 #define XNREUSE  0x00000001     /* Reuse pod with identical properties */
00039 
00040 /* Pod status flags */
00041 #define XNRPRIO  0x00000002     /* Reverse priority scheme */
00042 #define XNTIMED  0x00000004     /* Timer started */
00043 #define XNTMSET  0x00000008     /* Pod time has been set */
00044 #define XNTMPER  0x00000010     /* Periodic timing */
00045 #define XNFATAL  0x00000020     /* Pod encountered a fatal error */
00046 #define XNPIDLE  0x00000040     /* Pod is unavailable (initializing/shutting down) */
00047 #define XNTLOCK  0x00000080     /* Timer lock pending */
00048 
00049 /* Sched status flags */
00050 #define XNKCOUT  0x80000000     /* Sched callout context */
00051 #define XNHTICK  0x40000000     /* Host tick pending  */
00052 
00053 /* These flags are available to the real-time interfaces */
00054 #define XNPOD_SPARE0  0x01000000
00055 #define XNPOD_SPARE1  0x02000000
00056 #define XNPOD_SPARE2  0x04000000
00057 #define XNPOD_SPARE3  0x08000000
00058 #define XNPOD_SPARE4  0x10000000
00059 #define XNPOD_SPARE5  0x20000000
00060 #define XNPOD_SPARE6  0x40000000
00061 #define XNPOD_SPARE7  0x80000000
00062 
00063 /* Flags for context checking */
00064 #define XNPOD_THREAD_CONTEXT     0x1 /* Regular thread */
00065 #define XNPOD_INTERRUPT_CONTEXT  0x2 /* Interrupt service thread */
00066 #define XNPOD_HOOK_CONTEXT       0x4 /* Nanokernel hook */
00067 #define XNPOD_ROOT_CONTEXT       0x8 /* Root thread */
00068 
00069 #define XNPOD_NORMAL_EXIT  0x0
00070 #define XNPOD_FATAL_EXIT   0x1
00071 
00072 #define XNPOD_DEFAULT_TICKHANDLER  (&xnpod_announce_tick)
00073 
00074 #define XNPOD_ALL_CPUS  XNARCH_CPU_MASK_ALL
00075 
00076 #define XNPOD_HEAPSIZE  (CONFIG_XENO_OPT_SYS_HEAPSZ * 1024)
00077 #define XNPOD_PAGESIZE  512
00078 #define XNPOD_RUNPRIO   0x80000000 /* Placeholder for "stdthread priority" */
00079 
00080 /* Flags for xnpod_schedule_runnable() */
00081 #define XNPOD_SCHEDFIFO 0x0
00082 #define XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO 0x1
00083 #define XNPOD_NOSWITCH  0x2
00084 
00085 /* Normal root thread priority == min_std_prio - 1 */
00086 #define XNPOD_ROOT_PRIO_BASE   ((nkpod)->root_prio_base)

00152 #define xnsched_resched_mask() \
00153     (xnpod_current_sched()->resched)
00154 
00155 #define xnsched_resched_p()                     \
00156     (!xnarch_cpus_empty(xnsched_resched_mask()))
00157

00159     xnarch_cpu_isset(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), xnsched_resched_mask())

00165     xnarch_cpu_clear(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), xnsched_resched_mask())

00167 #define xnsched_clr_mask(__sched__) \
00168     xnarch_cpus_clear((__sched__)->resched)

00272 {
00273     nkpod->watchdog_trigger = xnarch_get_cpu_tsc() + nkpod->watchdog_reload;
00274     nkpod->watchdog_armed = 0;

00281 
00282 static inline int xnpod_get_qdir (xnpod_t *pod)
00283 {
00284     /* Returns the queuing direction of threads for a given pod */
00285     return testbits(pod->status,XNRPRIO) ? xnqueue_up : xnqueue_down;
00286 }
00287 
00288 static inline int xnpod_get_minprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr)
00289 {
00290     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00291         pod->minpri + incr :
00292         pod->minpri - incr;
00293 }
00294 
00295 static inline int xnpod_get_maxprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr)
00296 {
00297     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00298         pod->maxpri - incr :
00299         pod->maxpri + incr;
00300 }
00301 
00302 static inline int xnpod_priocompare (int inprio, int outprio)
00303 {
00304     /* Returns a negative, null or positive value whether inprio is
00305        lower than, equal to or greater than outprio. */
00306     int delta = inprio - outprio;
00307     return testbits(nkpod->status,XNRPRIO) ? -delta : delta;
00308 }
00309 
00310 static inline void xnpod_renice_root (int prio)
00311 
00312 {
00313     xnthread_t *rootcb;
00314     spl_t s;
00315 
00316     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00317     rootcb = &nkpod->sched[xnarch_current_cpu()].rootcb;
00318     rootcb->cprio = prio;
00319     xnpod_schedule_runnable(rootcb,XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO|XNPOD_NOSWITCH);
00320     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00321 }
00322 
00323     /* -- Beginning of the exported interface */
00324 
00325 #define xnpod_sched_slot(cpu) \
00326     (&nkpod->sched[cpu])
00327 
00328 #define xnpod_current_sched() \
00329     xnpod_sched_slot(xnarch_current_cpu())
00330 
00331 #define xnpod_interrupt_p() \
00332     (xnpod_current_sched()->inesting > 0)
00333 
00334 #define xnpod_callout_p() \
00335     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_sched()->status,XNKCOUT))
00336 
00337 #define xnpod_asynch_p() \
00338     (xnpod_interrupt_p() || xnpod_callout_p())
00339 
00340 #define xnpod_current_thread() \
00341     (xnpod_current_sched()->runthread)
00342 
00343 #define xnpod_current_root() \
00344     (&xnpod_current_sched()->rootcb)
00345 
00346 #define xnpod_current_p(thread) \
00347     (xnpod_current_thread() == (thread))
00348 
00349 #define xnpod_locked_p() \
00350     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNLOCK))
00351 
00352 #define xnpod_unblockable_p() \
00353     (xnpod_asynch_p() || testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNLOCK|XNROOT))
00354 
00355 #define xnpod_root_p() \
00356     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNROOT))
00357 
00358 #define xnpod_shadow_p() \
00359     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNSHADOW))
00360 
00361 #define xnpod_userspace_p() \
00362     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNROOT|XNSHADOW))
00363 
00364 #define xnpod_primary_p() \
00365     (!(xnpod_asynch_p() || xnpod_root_p()))
00366 
00367 #define xnpod_secondary_p() \
00368     (xnpod_root_p())
00369 
00370 #define xnpod_idle_p() xnpod_root_p()
00371 
00372 #define xnpod_timeset_p() \
00373     (!!testbits(nkpod->status,XNTMSET))

00375 static inline u_long xnpod_get_ticks2sec (void)
00376 {
00377     return nkpod->ticks2sec;
00378 }
00379 
00380 static inline u_long xnpod_get_tickval (void)
00381 {
00382     /* Returns the duration of a tick in nanoseconds */
00383     return nkpod->tickvalue;
00384 }
00385 
00386 static inline xntime_t xnpod_ticks2ns (xnticks_t ticks)
00387 {
00388     /* Convert a count of ticks in nanoseconds */
00389 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC
00390     return ticks * xnpod_get_tickval();
00391 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00392     return ticks;
00393 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00394 }
00395 
00396 static inline xnticks_t xnpod_ns2ticks (xntime_t t)
00397 {
00398 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC
00399     return xnarch_ulldiv(t,xnpod_get_tickval(),NULL);
00400 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00401     return t;
00402 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00403 }

00459 static inline void xnpod_lock_sched (void)
00460 {
00461     spl_t s;
00462 
00463     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00464 
00465     if (nkpod->schedlck++ == 0)
00466         __setbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00467 
00468     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00469 }
00470 
00471 static inline void xnpod_unlock_sched (void)
00472 {
00473     spl_t s;
00474 
00475     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00476 
00477     if (--nkpod->schedlck == 0)
00478         {
00479         __clrbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00480         xnpod_schedule();
00481         }
00482 
00483     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00484 }

00515 static inline void xnpod_yield (void)
00516 {
00517     xnpod_resume_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),0);
00518     xnpod_schedule();
00519 }

00521 static inline void xnpod_delay (xnticks_t timeout)
00522 {
00523     xnpod_suspend_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),XNDELAY,timeout,NULL);
00524 }

00526 static inline void xnpod_suspend_self (void)
00527 {
00528     xnpod_suspend_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),XNSUSP,XN_INFINITE,NULL);
00529 }
00530 
00531 static inline void xnpod_delete_self (void)
00532 {
00533     xnpod_delete_thread(xnpod_current_thread());
